EnExplanation: A conjunction used to connect words, clauses, or sentences.

Samples.EeSentence: Ma tahan kedagi näha ja rääkida temaga.
Samples.EnSentence: I want to see someone and talk to them.

Samples.EeSentence: Ma armastan sind ja mind armastab ka sina.
Samples.EnSentence: I love you and you love me too.
